T02D3440:99a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3440:99a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3440:99a-5: dang por re zhig zhal bkru ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D3440:99a-6: stan 'jam zhing bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3440:99a-7: rang gi snying gar pam yig las skyes pa'i padma'i steng du /
T02D3440:99a-8: aa yig las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3440:99a-9: steng du mam yig gi 'od zer gyis 'og min
T02D3440:99b-0: gyi gnas su @99b bzhugs pa de gdan drangs nas
T02D3440:99b-1: / thog ma med pa nas yang dag par grub
T02D3440:99b-2: pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mdun du bsgom
T02D3440:99b-3: / par bya'o // de nas phyi'i mchod pa me tog dang spos la sogs pa phul nas /
T02D3440:99b-5: yang phyi nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3440:99b-6: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3440:99b-7: dge ba yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D3440:99b-8: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3440:99b-9: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3440:99b-11: bdag nyid nges par dbul ba rnams byas nas /
T02D3440:99b-12: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3440:99b-13: yang dngos po mtha' dag gi de kho na nyid
T02D3440:99b-14: kyi snying po bsdus nas stong pa nyid du bsgom
T02D3440:99b-15: par bya'o // aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3440:99b-17: slar yang smon lam rjes su dran nas rang gi
T02D3440:99b-18: lus gzugs brnyan cam du rnam par bltas nas padma
T02D3440:99b-19: dang zla ba'i steng du mam yig gi sa bon
T02D3440:99b-20: gyi 'od zer gyis rab tu bcug nas /
T02D3440:99b-21: bdag nyid 'jam dpal gyi skur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3440:99b-22: sku mdog ser po bshad pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa
T02D3440:99b-23: rin po che'i rgyan dang rin po che'i cod pan
T02D3440:99b-24: can / g-yon pa autpal bsnams pa /
T02D3440:99b-25: seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing spyi bor mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa /
T02D3440:99b-26: zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od zer lta bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3440:99b-27: de nas g-yas phyogs logs su sum yig gi sa
T02D3440:99b-28: bon las byung ba'i nor bzangs gzhon nu sna tshogs
T02D3440:99b-29: pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis mdzes shing /
T02D3440:99b-30: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D3440:99b-31: chos thams cad kyi po ti cig mchan na bzung
T02D3440:99b-32: nas thal mo sbyar ba sngon du 'gro bas bzhugs
T02D3440:99b-33: pa'o // g-yon phyogs logs na gshin rje gshed sku
T02D3440:99b-34: mdog nag po h'um yig gi sa bon las byung
T02D3440:99b-35: ba zhal 'jigs shing phyag na tho ba bsnams pa
T02D3440:99b-36: pa'o // / skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3440:99b-37: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3440:99b-38: de nas g-yas dang g-yon phyogs logs su zla ba'i 'od dang nyi ma'i 'od dag go //
T02D3440:99b-39: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi cha la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D3440:99b-42: don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02D3440:99b-43: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su spyan ma dang /
T02D3440:100a-2: mig la sogs pa byin brlabs dang /
T02D3440:100a-3: lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur nas /
T02D3440:100a-4: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02D3440:100a-5: spyi bor mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab po //
T02D3440:100a-6: de nas bsam gtan dang ldan pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3440:100a-8: aom dharma dh'a tu w'a g'i shva ri mu:sv'a h'a zhes so //
